result.title: HCA HealthONE Rose First in Colorado to Adopt Perimeter's Advanced OCT Imaging Technology for Use in Surgery
result.text: TORONTO and DALLAS , Nov. 17, 2025 /PRNewswire/ - Perimeter Medical Imaging AI, Inc. (TSXV: PINK) (OTCQX: PYNKF) ("Perimeter" or the "Company"), a commercial-stage medical technology company, announced today that Dr. Kayla Griffith, Breast Surgical Oncologist, and HCA HealthONE Rose , part of the HCA HealthONE network of 9 hospitals and 17 surgery centers in the Rocky Mountain region and one of the largest health systems in the Denver area, are the first in Colorado to adopt the company's S-Series OCT (optical coherence tomography) advanced imaging technology for tissue visualization in the operating room. The S-Series is cleared by the FDA for general tissue imaging and is the only wide-field OCT technology used in surgical procedures today.
